Html:
Sorry, another couple of questions :)

Does .mage take account of mana gains from Master of Elements? (and/or Clearcasting?)

While I'm here, what's a good way to figure out shadowpriest Mp5?  At the moment I'm looking up my total mana gain in WWS then doing:  Mp5 =  total_gained / (fight_time_seconds / 5)

It takes into account MoE and CC.

For shadow priest go to Buffs & Debuffs in WWS and look up how much mana you gained from Vampiric Touch. Then do as you said, divide by total fight duration and multiply by 5.
